page.title: 09Employment(3)
page.content: In the village of Aston Crews are two pubs which provide employment for local people.The people who live at The White Hart have been there for nearly three years;at The Penny Farthing the owners have just moved in. As well as serving drinks the pubs between them serve around 800 meals a week.They employ 6 or 8 people who are paid Â£1:65p an hour.They open from 11:00am to 2:30pm and from 6:30pm to 11:00pm.They cater for local people and a lot of tourists. Also at Aston Crews is a fruit farm which was built in 1908.The man has been working there for 46 years.He employs 3 full-time workers and two part-time workers.They pick the fruit and prune the trees.They work with strawberries,raspberries and apples. The workers are paid Â£1:90 an hour.
